extracted_playbook.title: Avoid Opening Untrusted WRL Files
extracted_playbook.description: Do not open untrusted WRL files in affected applications to reduce risk.

extracted_playbook.condition: Which Teamcenter Visualization version is in use?

extracted_playbook.title: Update Teamcenter Visualization V14.2
extracted_playbook.description: Update Teamcenter Visualization V14.2 to V14.2.0.14 or later version.

extracted_playbook.title: Update Teamcenter Visualization V14.3
extracted_playbook.description: Update Teamcenter Visualization V14.3 to V14.3.0.12 or later version.

extracted_playbook.title: Update Teamcenter Visualization V2312
extracted_playbook.description: Update Teamcenter Visualization V2312 to V2312.0008 or later version.

extracted_playbook.title: Update Teamcenter Visualization V2406
extracted_playbook.description: Update Teamcenter Visualization V2406 to V2406.0005 or later version.

extracted_playbook.title: Protect Network Access
extracted_playbook.description: Protect network access to devices with appropriate mechanisms and configure the environment according to Siemens' operational guidelines for industrial security.

extracted_playbook.title: Minimize Network Exposure
extracted_playbook.description: Minimize network exposure for all control system devices and/or systems, ensuring they are not accessible from the internet.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Firewalls and VPNs
extracted_playbook.description: Locate control system networks and remote devices behind firewalls and isolate them from business networks. Use secure methods like VPNs for remote access.

extracted_playbook.title: Perform Risk Assessment
extracted_playbook.description: Perform proper impact analysis and risk assessment prior to deploying defensive measures.

extracted_playbook.title: Avoid Social Engineering Attacks
extracted_playbook.description: Do not click web links or open attachments in unsolicited email messages. Refer to resources on avoiding email scams and social engineering attacks.

extracted_playbook.title: Report Suspected Malicious Activity
extracted_playbook.description: Follow established internal procedures and report findings to CISA for tracking and correlation against other incidents.
